name: SolidOrganTransplant
title: Solid Organ Transplant
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a solid organ transplant.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to procedure.The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a solid organ transplant.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant ICD-10-PCS procedure concepts associated with transplantation of solid organs.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude relevant ICD-10-PCS concepts associated with codes representing tissue and other non-solid organ transplants.)
